_sText:
Here's another collection of maps ported from 1.6 bhop/kz, to the source engine on CS:S. The following maps may still have some issues, but at the time this was the best we could do for some of these maps as some of these date before we fully figured out vertex alignment/lmp file corruption.
If some of the errors seem off-putting, just know we wouldn't release any map if it was completely bugged, or broken/unplayable.

As always by the way to the original authors, PLEASE let us know if you don't want us re-distributing your map on this website, we will take it down IMMEDIATELY.

bhop_2bbhop_css
ISSUES:
-Water has weird flashing/glowing effect to it
-Telehops aren't alligned straight, but this isnt necessarily a bad thing

bhop_crossfuckers
ISSUES:
-First level perhaps too dark(?)
-2nd level has some nodraw issues which are virtually unfixable (as of now)

bhop_gamebox_css
ISSUES:
-None.

bhop_instant_disconnect_fix
ISSUES:
-Eye warning.
-Not a bhop map, mostly KZ.

bhop_madness
ISSUES:
-None.

bhop_framebhop_larger
ISSUES:
-None.

bhop_nz_long_again
ISSUES:
-This map is incredibly broken and after dozens of attempts this was the best I could do, sorry.

bhop_nz_playstation2
ISSUES:
-Vertex issues and messy brushwork, can't be bothered to fix as this is an exceedingly old port and the map never truly came out correctly.
-End zone has a timer box that may get in the way, didn't delete it because it was in the original map.

bhop_sunkenbhop
ISSUES:
-None

bhop_stoneblocks
ISSUES:
-None of the skips are fixed/patched, so the map is very short.

bhop_vly
ISSUES:
-None.

bhop_volcanobhop
ISSUES:
-One or two of the triggers are broken, would fix but I don't have the original vmf.
NOTES:
This map is the ORIGINAL volcanobhop, not the re-make implemented for KZMod (bhop_kz_volcano) which had a massive skip near the end that let you fly to the top using displacements, this version has flat brushwork so it isn't possible, forcing you to do it the intended way.

bhop_ytt_nonstop
ISSUES:
-None.
